document.full_text: a united nations plane crashed while trying to land at the airport serving congo's capital kinshasa on monday, killing least 20 people, a government official said.
document.title: u.n. plane crashes in congo, at least 20 dead
lines_and_colors: a united nations plane crashed while trying to land at the airport serving congo's capital kinshasa on monday, killing least 20 people, a government official said.
